text: The Royal Veterinary College (informally the RVC) is a veterinary school in London. It is a constituent college of the university of London. The RVC was founded in 1791. It becme a part of the university of London in 1949. it is the oldest and the largest veterinary school in the United Kingdom and one of only nine schools in the country where students can study to become a Veterinarian. == References == == Other websites == * * Queen visits the College in 1959 * Royal College of Veterinary Surgeons Category:Universities in London Category:1791 establishments Category:Veterinary medicine
title: Royal Veterinary College
